title: Karma mains rejoice! You can once again kill your enemies with a shield bomb.
body: You just have to pick Kayle.

replies.body: Yeah, no thanks. Everything is better than playing as something so stupid like a reworked champ.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f4d6IXeB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-08T01:09:37.002+0000)
>
> Seriously, dude, where is that hate for reworks coming from?
> I understand that many of them have become balancing problems and all, but come on, they did some good ones. Like these dudes:
> {{champion:14}} {{champion:19}}

Reworks are, at the best of times, partially removing a champion people have become fond of.
When it comes to old Poppy and Sion, there are good arguments for them being necessary.
When it comes to Irelia, Nunu, and Warwick?  Even if they are good, you have to ask yourself "but like, why?"

Reworks of the scale of Ez or Tristana's are not too major.
One's like Eve's requires a bit of justification, but okay.
Total deletions like Aatrox's?  Should never happen.

Nunu and WW had bland designd, so did Kayle. Yes people become fond of them, but over time they become more and more useless or op due to simple buffs because of their simplicity.

Aatrox didn't need one either imo, but I can see how he also started to enter this category. His rework is definetly not the best solution as  slower riven with more healing.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f4d6IXeB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-08T01:09:37.002+0000)
>
> Seriously, dude, where is that hate for reworks coming from?
> I understand that many of them have become balancing problems and all, but come on, they did some good ones. Like these dudes:
> {{champion:14}} {{champion:19}}

I find removals unacceptable, and i refuse to conform to them.

Sion and Poppy are good reworks. The thing is, they are different champions from what they were before. And because of that just cause you liked old any of the two above, will you love the new one, especially when their champion class has been changed.
We're talking about *Karma*. If you're playing her you're already playing a reworked champion.
